snippet: After the success of “War Horse” and “One Man, Two Guvnors,” the theater plans to take a more active role developing productions for a North American audience.
abstract: After the success of “War Horse” and “One Man, Two Guvnors,” the theater plans to take a more active role developing productions for a North American audience.

headline.main: Britain's National Theater To Open New York Office
headline.print_headline: Britain’s National Theater Opens New York Office
